description:
Hotori Tadase attends Seiyo Academy, and is the Kings Chair and leader of the Guardians. He is in love with Amu`s transformation "Amulet Heart", but not her herself.
He has aspirations for world domination, and whenever anyone calls him a prince, or princely (because of his looks), he changes character and goes on a tirade about how he is a king.
name: Hotori Tadase
